boardgame.name: Marvel Dice Masters: Age of Ultron
boardgame.description: Marvel Dice Masters: Age of Ultron is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this game, each player fields one of the superhero teams, with each hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Captain Marvel, Daredevil, Kang and more _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; being represented by custom-tooled dice; each team must be composed of 15 dice, and a player can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; dice only from his team. Each hero also has one or more character reference cards, which show the special abilities for the characters based on the die rolls. Different versions of these cards will be available in booster packs, allowing for more customization of your team. Players use these dice to collect energy, recruit new heroes, and battle head-to-head. In addition, each player brings two basic action cards to the game, which are placed in the center of the table; both players can purchase these cards. A player wins once the opposing player has been reduced to zero life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Marvel Dice Masters: Age of Ultron starter set comes with 44 custom dice, 38 cards, two dice bags, and a core rulebook. Booster packs include two dice with two matching character cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is for user sephi21roth only. This comes in a Plano style storage box.

Bag of dice...appears to be Age of Ultron and War of Light starters (both rulebooks included). They are mixed together and I am not sure of completeness, there may be extras in here too. Just never got around to playing it unfortunately.

Full set of Common, Uncommon, Rares. Just missing one Super Rare (Captain Universe). All cards are sleeved and include max dice. Message me for more details and be sure to check out my other Dicemasters sales! See https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/1297848 for pics of my complete collection.
